Class GLUCylinder

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XrayShape

    public class GLUCylinder
extends GLUShape
    Render a GLU (OpenGL Utility Library) cylinder or cone.

      • GLUCylinder

        public GLUCylinder(Vector3 origin,
           Color mainColor,
           Color secondaryColor,
           float baseRadius,
           float topRadius,
           float height)
        Parameters:
        origin - the absolute world x/y/z coordinates of the sphere's center.
        mainColor - a Color instance specifying the RGBA values used to render the sphere
        secondaryColor - if non-null, the RGBA used to render occluded sections of the sphere
        baseRadius -
        topRadius -
        height -
